definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Then they switch internet service providers and lose the olde -mail.
sentences.chinese: 然後轉因特網服務提供商和失去舊電子郵件。

sentences.english: Becoming more useful to third-party service providers needs to be the watchword for operators in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在未來，有利於第三方服務提供商將是運營商的口號。

sentences.english: And it is less expensive for service providers to upgrade their equipment to than LTE.
sentences.chinese: 對於服務提供商而言，升級設備的成本要比LTE低。

sentences.english: Computing rebates from network connectivity downtimes from your internet provider.
sentences.chinese: 計算退稅的網絡連接停工從您的互聯網服務提供商。

sentences.english: Phone companies and service providers are scrambling to block mobile malware.
sentences.chinese: 電話公司和服務提供商正在努力堵截手機惡意軟件。

sentences.english: How one services provider provides first-class service to its agency clients.
sentences.chinese: 一個服務提供商怎麼樣給他的顧客以一流的服務。

sentences.english: Odd numbers are used for non- wireline service providers.
sentences.chinese: 對於非無線服務提供商要使用奇數。

sentences.english: Here are the top ten broadband service providers in the US based on download speeds.
sentences.chinese: 下面是美國下載速度最快的前十名寬帶服務提供商。
